modName: Smithing mod - Armorsmith and Weaponsmith Perks
summary: Adds Weaponsmith perk and Armorsmith perk and some specialisation perks.
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=Yellow]Comments and suggestions are welcome. Please endorse if you like it.[/color] [/heading]
[color=Red]I will update this this summer[/color] 

[font=\"Arial\"]What i\'ll try to do next:[/font] 
-Divide all the smithing tree into 3 or 4 branches:
1. Weaponsmithing
-Will include previous perks for weapon smithing and a perk to learn new shematics for weapons only.
-Maybe more perks
2. Armorsmithing
-Will include previous perks for armor smithing and two perk to learn shematics for light armor and heavy armor.
-Maybe more perks
3. Arcane blacksmithing
-Add more levels, making it looking like:
Lvl 1: Can improve enchanted items but 50% less
Lvl 2: Can improve enchated items but 90% less
-Maybe more perks
4. Smelting and Mining
-A perk to mine faster
-A perk to get more ore from mining
-A perk to get more ingots from refining ores like: Lvl 1: 2ingot/3ore and Lvl2: 1ingot/1ore
-Maybe more perks

General
-Maybe add crafting recipes found in books to make already enchanted armor.
-Also when you begin to smith you don\'t know how to craft armor or weapons so to get the recipies you\'ll need at least 20 in smithing.
-I\'m planning to make a version for people who use skill uncappers
-I\'m planning to make it more balanced (Cause it ain\'t balanced that much :P)

[color=Yellow]You have something you\'d like me to add to this list? Suggest it in the comments![/color]


[font=\"Arial\"][heading][color=yellow] OVERVIEW V1.1[/color] [/heading][/font] 

[list] 
[*]All smithing skills now multiply effiency by 1.8 instead of 2 for their respective materials for balance reasons 

[*]Steel smithing allows to multiply the effiency of weapons and armors made of Leather, Hide, Iron and other basic material.

[*]Steel smithing now need 20 in smithing

[*]This mod adds Weapon Smithing perk and Armor Smithing perk

[*]What these perks do (Same for Armor Smithing and weapon Smithing) :
 
     [*][color=green]First level[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.15 
Need steel smithing and 30 in smithing

    [*][color=green]Second level[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.20 
Need 65 in smithing

     [*][color=green]Third level[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.25 
Need 90 in smithing 

    [*][color=green]Fourth level[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.35 
Need 100 in smithing 
[color=red]You can\'t have both Armor Smithing Level 4 and Weapon Smithing Level 4[/color]

[*]There is also specialisation perks:

Weapons specialisations [color=red](only one of those can be activated at the same time)[/color]:

[*][color=green]Axes specialisation[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.1  for axes
Need 40 in smithing and Weapon Smithing Lvl1

[*][color=green]Bows specialisation[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.1 for bowa
Need 40 in smithing and Weapon Smithing Lvl1

[*][color=green]Maces specialisation[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.1 for maces
Need 40 in smithing and Weapon Smithing Lvl1

[*][color=green]Swords specialisation[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.1 for swords
Need 40 in smithing and Weapon Smithing Lvl1

Armor specialisations [color=red](only one of those can be activated at the same time)[/color]:

[*][color=green]Heavy armor specialisation[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.1  for heavy armors
Need 40 in smithing and Armor Smithing Lvl1

[*][color=green]Light armor specialisation[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.1  for light armors
Need 40 in smithing and Armor Smithing Lvl1

[*][color=green]Shields specialisation[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.4  for shields
Need 40 in smithing and Armor Smithing Lvl1
[/list]



[color=red]Older Version (included in main download)[/color]

[font=\"Arial\"][heading][color=yellow] OVERVIEW V1.0[/color][/heading][/font] 

[list] 
[*]All smithing skills now multiply effiency by 1.8 instead of 2 for their respective materials for balance reasons 
[*]Steel smithing allows to multiply the effiency of weapons and armors made of Leather, Hide, Iron and other basic material.
[*]Steel smithing now need 20 in smithing
[*]This mod adds Weaponsmith perk and Armorsmith perk
[*]What these perks do (Same for armorsmith and weaponsmith) :
 

     [*][color=green]First level[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.2 
Need steel smithing and 30 in smithing

    [*][color=green]Second level[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.3 
Need 65 in smithing

     [*][color=green]Third level[/color]: Multiply effiency by 1.4 
Need 100 in smithing
[/list]
